channel.title: Whats happened to this community?
channel.description: im just saying i think the rsc server development thing is going down the shitter, its just my opinion, because everyone is DDoSing other peoples server so they get more people. It's getting very annoying and shitty, seriously, people spend at least sometime doing servers and other people have to ruin it by hacking/db hacking and ddosing each other, nobody can accept that there is other rsc servers. I just think its un thoughtful to do that. we are trying to bring back rsc but all we get is "0mfgz, Sw4g r dd0sedz, oh n0ez" and shit like that, idk about you guys i just think this community is in the gutter atm, im going to play this stuff again once its going good again like when ddosing didnt happen much so farewell for a while.

item.title: Whats happened to this community?
item.dc:creator: @Zero187 Zero187
item.description:
@Zero187 wrote:

RSC was dead years ago
No point in making a private server because no one is going to play since we all assume it will be taken down again shortly. I’ve played on 2 private servers, 1 where I reached 99 99 99 and then it was gone. I don’t think I could put that much energy into it again and I doubt many other people would either… Private servers were cool when they were new, but now they are old and not reliable enough. If someone could keep one up for a while then maybe this forum would come alive again, but it’s just too much of a waste to start playing, knowing the server won’t last long.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats happened to this community?
item.dc:creator: @extacy extacy
item.description:
@extacy wrote:

sasquiotch:

makes me sick… the advancements i’ve seen and helped with throughout the years in this community… when the rsc board contained nothing but the originals… oldscape, rscd and geminus… then it all started with storks… he made rsc servers so mainstream everyone had to have their own server… demonik got shut down and released there were a few hundred demonik knock off servers now rsc has custom items and it makes me sick… we wanted to make rsc the way it was if we wanted dragon armor we would play rs2… you fuck heads ruined most everything the founding members of this site worked so hard to make…

They never made “custom” items, it’s just xml edited items with a different overlay lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats happened to this community?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:9, topic:227843”][quote author=i_pk_pjers_i link=topic=299450.msg2406309#msg2406309 date=1219724886]
No we have plenty of newfags. We need more new “programmers”.
[/quote]
Don’t bring 4chan shit here. And if you weren’t an idiot you would see that I said mean we need more new people willing to learn, not letting the old people do stuff.[/quote]
Even though I am your friend, I don’t think you’re in any position to be calling anyone an idiot when it comes to Runescape cheating. When was the last time you had anything to do with Runescape, other than playing it?

Read full topic

item.title: Whats happened to this community?
item.dc:creator: @Velocity Velocity
item.description:
@Velocity wrote:

Most servers get DDoSed because most servers are shit. Majority of server admins take an open source, upload it, Re-Name the website, and call it a new a server. Most of the clients needed to play on said servers have the original source name still on them!

If anything the DDoSers are doing as all a favor.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats happened to this community?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I can count the number of (active) people in this forum who aren’t absolute clowns on one hand, and still have fingers leftover.

And if you weren’t an idiot you would see that I said mean we need more new people willing to learn, not letting the old people do stuff.[/quote]But I’m not an idiot, and you should of been more specific. We have tones of new people. Nobody here is willing to learn anything.

item.title: Whats happened to this community?
item.dc:creator: @extacy extacy
item.description:
@extacy wrote:

[quote=“xEnt, post:2, topic:227843”]But that’s where your wrong, people here are not trying to bring back rsc servers, a few out of a hundred maybe but all the rest is some shitty 2 minute servers who cannot advance in anyway.

Development on this forum is dead, because all the development that does get done do not get done on these forums. I know a bunch of people who i talk with in other places other than this that do development. Except the word Development in these forums is completely ruined and you’ll notice there’s not much development around here, because it’s all private.

The smart one’s who can do something, know it’s not right to come post on these forums. These forums are just about help setting up a server and server advertisement. I doubt it will ever change too.[/quote]

Read full topic
